SELECT u.id, u.login_name, u.nick_name, u.tel, u.email, u.password, u.salt, u.locked, u.del_flag, u.icon, r.id AS "role.id", r.name AS "role.name", m.id AS "menu.id", m.name AS "menu.name", m.permission AS "menu.permission", m.href AS "menu.href", m.bg_color AS "menu.bgColor", m.icon AS "menu.icon", m.sort AS "menu.sort", u.remarks from sys_user u left join sys_user_role sur on sur.user_id = u.id left join sys_role r on r.id = sur.role_id left join sys_role_menu srm on srm.role_id = r.id left join sys_menu m on m.id = srm.menu_id where 1=1
and u.del_flag = false and r.del_flag = false
and ( u.login_name = #{loginName} or u.tel = #{loginName} or u.email = #{loginName} )
and u.id = #{id}

select (select count(*) from sys_user where del_flag =false) as "sys:user:list", (select count(*) from sys_role where del_flag =false) as "sys:role:list", (select count(*) from sys_menu where del_flag =false) as "sys:menu:list", (select count(*) from sys_rescource where del_flag = false) as "sys:rescource:list", (select count(*) from sys_log where del_flag = false) as "sys:log:list", 24 as "sys:site:list", (select count(*) from information_schema.tables where table_schema='vmyun') as "sys:table:list", (select count(*) from sys_dict where del_flag = false) as "sys:dict:list", (select count(*) from quartz_task where del_flag = false) as "quartz:task:list", (select count(*) from quartz_task_log where del_flag = false) as "quartz:log:list"
